name: Rending Slashes
description: Slice an enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations, dealing 718 Bleed Damage with each weapon and causing them to bleed for an additional 2315 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds.  You also reduce their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the initial damage and reduces the enemy's Movement Speed.
coefDescription: Slice an enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations, dealing $1 Bleed Damage with each weapon and causing them to bleed for an additional $2 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds.  You also reduce their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
